description:
This week I thought I would take a break from the straight boys and bring you two very hot guys and a whole lot of chemistry.

We met Joel in "Auditions 9". He's a cute Asian dude with a boyish face and a muscular, tight body. And, he loves getting fucked. Ricardo is a sexy Cuban with a big, uncut dick who doesn't say much.

I wasn't sure how things were going to work out when I decided to pair them up because you can never be sure if people are going to click. Well, they clicked all right! I didn't do much talking in this video - mostly because I didn't have to. I kept my mouth shut and let them ravage each other and they just fucked and fucked and fucked.
title: Joel & Ricardo
